attributes.action: revert Student Finance England back to Student Finance Direct
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new system doesn't work at all, the phone lines are busy for hours a day, and sometimes are on hold for half an hour on a premium rate number before you get spoken to.

We would like to see the system for higher education loans be reverted back to the old system that worked or a huge change published.

Loans were given on time, and people weren't left worrying about whether they would get their financing on time or not.
